headline: Halliburton Unveils XTR CS Injection Valve for CCUS Wells
summary: HAL introduces the XTR CS injection system, a wireline-retrievable safety valve engineered to enhance CO2 injection reliability in CCUS wells.

raw.headline: Halliburton Unveils XTR CS Injection Valve for CCUS Wells
raw.summary: HAL introduces the XTR CS injection system, a wireline-retrievable safety valve engineered to enhance CO2 injection reliability in CCUS wells.
